---
title: "Chisq-Results-Processor"
format: html
---

I will begin by loading three things.  

1. the data that were stored from creating the batch file.

```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(jsonlite)
library(tidyverse)
load("rchisq-9.RData")
```

2. The queries

```{r}
Chisq9Call <- stream_in(file("rchisq-9-Call-Revised-0806.jsonl"))
```

3. The Results

```{r}
Chisq9Result <- stream_in(file("rchisq-9_0806_output.jsonl"))
```

## Merge the call and the result

```{r}
Chisq.9.OpenAI <- left_join(Chisq9Call,Chisq9Result)
Full.Chisq.9.0806 <- left_join(Chisq9$params, Chisq.9.OpenAI)
```

The file is saved as `Full.Chisq.9.0806.RData`.

Put the result in the params file.

```{r}
Full.Chisq.9.0806$Outcome <- map_chr(Chisq9$params$iter, function(x) { unlist(Chisq9Result$response$body$choices[[x]][[2]][2]) })
table(Full.Chisq.9.0806$Outcome)
```

```{r}
save(Full.Chisq.9.0806, file="Full.Chisq.9.0806.RData")
```
